about_the_game:
Now that Lil' Dude has turned 30, he's decided to become a wizard and summon a succubus to take his virginity!

Use alchemy to brew the potions and ingredients needed to summon and seduce each succubus. Can you help Lil' Dude get laid?

The free demo contains 1 succubus to get you started. There are more succubi and ingredients in the full version (save data should transfer).

Features:
  • 55 brewable ingredients & potions
  • 9 sexy succubi to summon and seduce
  • 1 secret bonus summon
  • 3 sexy spirits to seduce (Halloween update!)
  • 2D Animated sex scenes
  • Optional sex rhythm game
  • Tutorial + Help Guide
  • Ingredient storage manager
  • Built-in hint system
  • Recipe viewer
  • Image Viewer (+scene viewer)
  • Original soundtrack
  • Mod support
  • Basketball hoop (very important)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains alchemy, a summoning circle, succubus characters, a monster girl, and seductive spirits. 
Sexual content includes an optional nude mode (makes characters naked), animated sex scenes (uncensored), and frequent discussion of sex.
There is a tragic ghost origin story and in external media, one female spirit is implied to have lived in a male body.
